bio.summary: Jonathan is a web/mobile app developer, composer, and cellist.

work.summary: Develop web and mobile apps using Backbone, Marionette, and IBM Worklight
Provide technology consulting, web design/development, and video production services to individuals and nonprofit organizations
Mentor high school and college students in programming and graphics; Develop online curriculum materials and infrastructure to support computational science education

education.institution: University of North Carolina at Greensboro

publications.name: Live manipulation of documentary audio in a narrative electroacoustic concert piece
publications.publisher: Master's Thesis / University of North Carolina at Greensboro
